Name: zho-anonymousgroupo-la
Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators
Source: Goodword Books , http://www.goodwordbooks.com/ , Center for Peace and Spirituality , https://www.cpsglobal.org/

Translations.Text: Wo que yi paiqian mu sa daizhe wo de xuduo jixiang he mingzheng
qu jiaohua falao ji qi guizu, dan tamen shuncong falao de mingling, er falao de mingling bushi zhengque de
Zai fuhuo ri, fa laojiang yindao ta de baixing, er jiang tamen yinru huo yu, tamen suo jinru di nage difang zhen elie
Tamen zai jinshi shou zuzhou, zai fuhuo ri ye zaoshou zuzhou. Tamen suo shou de yuanzhu zhen elie
Zhe shi yi zao huimie di naxie shi zhen de xiaoxi, wo ba ta gaosu ni. Naxie shi zhen you feixu you zai de, you dangran wu cun de
Wo meiyou kuidai tamen, dan tamen kuidai ziji. Tamen she zhenzhu er qidao de zhong shenling, dang ni de zhu de mingling jianglin de shihou, duiyu tamen wujiyushi, zhi shi tamen geng shou sunshang
Dang ni de zhu huimie bu yi de shi zhen de shihou, ta de chengfa jiushi zheyang de. Ta de chengfa que shi tongku de, que shi yanli de
Duiyu weiju houshi chengfa de ren, ci zhong que youyi zhong jixiang. Na shi shiren jiang bei jihe zhi ri, na shi shiren jiang bei zhengming zhi ri
Wo zhi jiang ta zhan huan dao yige ding qi
Zai na ri chengfa jiangyao jianglin, mei geren xu jing zhenzhu de yunxu cai de fayan, tamen dangzhong you boming de, you xingfu de
Zhiyu boming de, jiang jinru huo yu, tamen zai qizhong jiang yao tanqi, jiangyao gengyan
Tamen jiang tianchangdijiu de yong ju qizhong. Chufei ni de zhu suo yiyu de, ni de zhu que shi weisuoyuwei de.ยง
Zhiyu xingfu de, jiang jinru leyuan, er yong ju qizhong, tianchangdijiu, chufei ni de zhu suo yiyu de. Na shi buduan de shangci
Ni dui zhe deng ren suo chongbai de (ouxiang), buyao huaiyi, tamen zhi xiang tamen de zuxian nayang chongbai, wo biding yao ba tamen de fen er wanquan wuque de shangci tamen
